name: Code Flask Back End Api Create Checkout Agent
shortDescription: Creates the /api/create-checkout endpoint for payment sessions.
fullDescription: This agent is responsible for implementing the /api/create-checkout endpoint in the Flask backend. It handles generating new checkout sessions based on the provided base logic, preparing users for payment, and linking transactions to user accounts.
UseCases:
1. Create a new checkout session for user payments.
2. Prepare transaction data and redirect users to payment gateways.
3. Associate checkout sessions with user accounts or product data.
